buffmobs.config.general.enabled: Master toggle for the mod. When disabled, no mob buffs are applied.
buffmobs.config.general.visualEffects: Show particle effects on buffed mobs. Disable to reduce visual clutter.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.enabled: Scale mob difficulty based on in-game days. Mobs become stronger over time.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.interval: Days between each difficulty increase. Lower = more frequent scaling. Recommended: 7
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.multiplier: How much stronger mobs get per interval. 0.1 = 10% increase
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.maxMultiplier: Maximum strength multiplier. Prevents infinite scaling.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.showNotificat: Display messages when difficulty scales up.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.notificationM: When to show notifications: EVERY_DAY or SCALING_INCREASE_ONLY
buffmobs.config.attributes.healthMultipl: Multiplies mob health. 2.0 = double health, 1.0 = no change
buffmobs.config.attributes.damageMultipl: Multiplies mob damage. 1.5 = 50% more damage, 1.0 = no change
buffmobs.config.attributes.speedMultipli: Multiplies movement speed. Higher values = faster mobs
buffmobs.config.attributes.attackSpeedMu: Multiplies attack speed. Higher = more frequent attacks
buffmobs.config.attributes.armorAddition: Flat armor points added. Each point reduces damage by ~4%
buffmobs.config.attributes.armorToughnes: Flat armor toughness added. Reduces high-damage attacks
buffmobs.config.effects.strengthAmplifie: Strength effect level. 0 = disabled, higher = more damage
buffmobs.config.effects.speedAmplifier: Speed effect level. 0 = disabled, higher = faster movement
buffmobs.config.effects.resistanceAmplif: Resistance effect level. 0 = disabled, higher = less damage taken
buffmobs.config.effects.regenerationAmpl: Regeneration effect level. 0 = disabled. Not applied to undead
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.enabled: Mobs can inflict random debuffs on players: Poison, Slowness, Wither
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.chance: Chance per attack to apply debuff. 0.15 = 15% chance per hit
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.poisonDur: Duration of poison effect in seconds when triggered
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.slownessD: Duration of slowness effect in seconds. Reduces player speed
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.witherDur: Duration of wither effect in seconds. Similar to poison but stronger
buffmobs.config.mobFilter.useWhitelist: Only buff mobs in the whitelist. If disabled, uses blacklist mode
buffmobs.config.mobFilter.whitelist: Mob IDs to buff (whitelist mode). Format: minecraft:zombie
buffmobs.config.mobFilter.blacklist: Mob IDs to never buff. Default: minecraft:warden (too powerful)
buffmobs.config.modidFilter.useWhitelist: Only buff mobs from whitelisted mods. Useful for mod compatibility
buffmobs.config.modidFilter.whitelist: Mod IDs whose mobs can be buffed. Format: minecraft, twilightforest
buffmobs.config.modidFilter.blacklist: Mod IDs whose mobs should never be buffed
buffmobs.config.dimensionFilter.useWhite: Only apply buffs in whitelisted dimensions
buffmobs.config.dimensionFilter.whitelis: Dimensions where buffs apply. Format: minecraft:overworld
buffmobs.config.dimensionFilter.blacklis: Dimensions where buffs should never be applied
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.ena: Ranged mobs change behavior when close. Affects skeletons, piglins, pillagers
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.beh: How ranged mobs behave when close: 'melee' = switch to sword/axe | 'retreat' = back away while shooting | 'random' = 50/50 chance per mob
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.swi: Distance at which mobs change behavior. Lower = closer before switching
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.mel: Movement speed multiplier when in melee mode
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.ret: Movement speed when retreating. Higher = faster retreat. Default: 1.2 (20% faster)
How long mobs retreat before stopping. 20 ticks = 1 second. Default: 60 (3 sec). Has 5 second cooldown
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.cus: Custom mob IDs to apply this system. Format: modid:mob_name
